actors

Class Character

  • java.lang.Object
    • actors.Character
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Mage

    public class Character
extends java.lang.Object
    Use to create player and enemies
    See Also:
    Warrior, Mage

    • Constructor Detail

      • Character

        public Character()
        Base constructor. This constructor create a basic character. Be able to change this later

      • Character

        public Character(java.lang.String name,
                 int hp,
                 int ap)
        Use this constructor to create a character by choosing his name, hp & ap
        Parameters:
        name - String Character name
        hp - int Character HP
        ap - int Character AP

      • Character

        public Character(java.lang.String archetype,
                 java.lang.String name,
                 int hp,
                 int maxHp,
                 int ap,
                 int maxAp,
                 java.lang.String skillOne,
                 java.lang.String skillTwo,
                 java.lang.String skillThree,
                 java.lang.String skillFour,
                 int gold,
                 int minGold)
        Use this constructor to create a character by choosing all parameters
        Parameters:
        archetype - String Character archetype
        name - String Character name
        hp - int Character HP
        maxHp - int Character maxHP
        ap - int Character AP
        maxAp - int Character maxAP
        skillOne - Weapon Character weapon slot
        skillTwo - Spell Character spell slot 1
        skillThree - Spell Character spell slot 2
        skillFour - Item Character item slot
        gold - int Character gold earned
        minGold - int Character minimum gold to loot from
